description:
Marasco & Nesselbush, LLP: Turn To Us For Trusted Personal Injury, Medical Malpractice And Social Security Disability Representation

Representing clients throughout New England, Marasco & Nesselbush, LLP, is dedicated to helping the victims of negligence secure full and fair compensation for medical bills, damages, pain and suffering, lost wages, and other expenses. Whether you were injured in a car crash or if your doctor or nurse failed to take proper precautions while treating you, you likely have questions and concerns regarding your options. As your attorneys, we will work with you, take the time to understand your needs and goals, and fight aggressively for your interests in the following:

  • Car, truck, motorcycle and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Catastrophic injuries
  • Medical malpractice
  • Social Security Disability
  • Wrongful death
  • Product liability
  • Slip and fall as well as other premises liability

At our firm, we operate with a simple goal in mind: to provide extraordinary results for each and every client we work with. With decades of combined experience, a network of professional resources and the skill to take on the most complex cases, we are confident that we can help you secure the compensation and benefits necessary to recover comfortably.

There's no reason to hesitate; contact us and learn your options during a free initial consultation with a personal injury lawyer. We have seven convenient office locations throughout New England, including offices in Providence, Warwick, Woonsocket and Wakefield, Rhode Island, Lawrence and Quincy, Massachusetts, and New London, Connecticut.
